about_the_game:
Rogue Squad is a cooperative bullet-hell roguelike following a squad of adventurers ready to explore, battle, upgrade, and die to reach the PRIME TRINKET! Join your friends over online multiplayer and progress through challenging rooms with unique enemies. Gaia is waiting. You fate has already been decided.

The Land

The world of Project Squad is split into various special locations. Each location has unique enemies, challenges, and rewards. Explore the locations and defeat the bosses to collect loot and progress through the world. Adventure awaits!

Trinkets

Upgrade your skill set with trinkets that shake up game play. Shoot bullets backwards or do double damage, the choice is yours! Acquire trinkets through challenges. Craft your own build.

Weapons

Tailor your play style to your favorite weapon. Boomerang, spear, hammer: You name it! Keep in mind what trinkets you choose to build the ultimate combo of utter destruction!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
